description: Learn our clever hack to make instant pork meatballs. This speedy pesto pasta is super tasty and ready in 15 minutes, perfect for when you're short on time.
name: Pork, Fennel & Pea Gnocchi Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
500 g Woolworths Italian style fennel pork sausages
290 g Woolworths Italian style salad kit

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, prepare salad according to packet instructions. Serve gnocchi with salad and topped with remaining parmesan.
